title: Introducing MicroHertz
description:
We’re thrilled to announce the launch of MicroHertz, a brand new bonus series available exclusively to our premium subscribers. MicroHertz will feature mini stories, Q&As, sound news, and much more. The first episode is available now. In it, Dallas gives a behind-the-scenes breakdown of making episode #150, “Breathe.” To get MicroHertz and our entire catalog completely ad-free, sign up at 20k.org/plus, or by tapping Subscribe in Apple Podcasts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
We’re thrilled to announce the launch of MicroHertz, a brand new bonus series available exclusively to our premium subscribers. MicroHertz will feature mini stories, Q&As, sound news, and much more. The first episode is available now. In it, Dallas gives a behind-the-scenes breakdown of making episode #150, “Breathe.” To get MicroHertz and our entire catalog completely ad-free, sign up at 20k.org/plus, or by tapping Subscribe in Apple Podcasts.
